V

VirtualGamble - Interface in stockmarket.model
This interface represents a virtual gamble which that helps users who are new to investing to learn about how money could grow.
VirtualGambleController - Interface in stockmarket.controller
This interface represents a controller for the Virtual Gamble Application.The Controller is responsible for controlling the application logic and acts as the coordinator between the View and the Model.
VirtualGambleControllerGUI - Class in stockmarket.controller
This is a GUI Controller Class which implements the Features Interface.
VirtualGambleControllerGUI(VirtualGamble, VirtualGambleGUI) - Constructor for class stockmarket.controller.VirtualGambleControllerGUI
Constructor to initialize the model and view of the application.
VirtualGambleControllerImpl - Class in stockmarket.controller
This is a Controller Class which implements the VirtualGambleController Interface.
VirtualGambleControllerImpl(Readable, Appendable) - Constructor for class stockmarket.controller.VirtualGambleControllerImpl
This creates an object of VirtualGambleControllerImpl.
VirtualGambleForm - Class in stockmarket.view
 
VirtualGambleForm(String, String[], boolean) - Constructor for class stockmarket.view.VirtualGambleForm
 
VirtualGambleForm(String) - Constructor for class stockmarket.view.VirtualGambleForm
 
VirtualGambleGraph - Class in stockmarket.view
 
VirtualGambleGraph() - Constructor for class stockmarket.view.VirtualGambleGraph
 
VirtualGambleGUI - Interface in stockmarket.view
This interface represents the Graphical User Interface for the Virtual Gamble Application.
VirtualGambleGUIImpl - Class in stockmarket.view
This class implements the VirtualGambleGUI interface and implements all the operations mandated by the interface.
VirtualGambleGUIImpl(String) - Constructor for class stockmarket.view.VirtualGambleGUIImpl
 
VirtualGambleGUIMain - Class in stockmarket.main
 
VirtualGambleGUIMain() - Constructor for class stockmarket.main.VirtualGambleGUIMain
 
VirtualGambleImpl - Class in stockmarket.model
This is an implementation of VirtualGamble Interface that provides functionality of adding new Portfolios, buying share and getting the total value and cost basis of particular portfolio.
VirtualGambleImpl() - Constructor for class stockmarket.model.VirtualGambleImpl
Constructor to initialize the portfolios map to an empty Hashmap.
VirtualGambleMain - Class in stockmarket.main
This class contains the main method which is used to start up the application.
VirtualGambleMain() - Constructor for class stockmarket.main.VirtualGambleMain
 
VirtualGambleView - Interface in stockmarket.view
This interface represents the View for the Virtual Gamble Application.
VirtualGambleViewImpl - Class in stockmarket.view
This class implements the VirtualGambleView interface and implements all the operations mandated by the interface.
VirtualGambleViewImpl() - Constructor for class stockmarket.view.VirtualGambleViewImpl
